review: I was so excited for this to come in the mail!! It worked perfect for1 day ... now it is pretty much useless.  I am not able to keep a wifi connection on the fire tv stick.  My network is running several other devices with NO PROBLEM, this device either has no connection, or "connected with problems". Netflix won't even open, and prime videos play for 6 seconds between buffering.  I have checked the discussion posts and several users are experiencing the same issue.  There obviously needs to be an update rolled out, however the device probably won't stay connected long enough to download it!  Very frustrated right now!
author: A. Davenport "sallyjo889"

review: I must have gotten a bad one.  Wireless would connect occasionally but would not stay connected.  Constant "Network not available" messages.  It sits just 15 feet from my wireless router!Also, keep in mind that some apps (like Plex for example) which are free on other media players (Roku... cough, cough) cost money to get on the Fire TV.  Plex costs $2 on this device.Time to try something else.
author: Someone K.

review: Great streaming device,  does everything that's advertised plus some. Is fast and awesome for Amazon Prime video streaming,  as well as Netflix.  But will not replace your Chromcast.  Amazon stick is for Amazon Prime  like Chromcast is for Google Play.  Indispensable of one another and both brilliant in their way.
